This technique allows the user to transfer their consciousness into more than one target by cloning their consciousness, giving them complete control of the bodies for a short period of time. Like the [[Mind Body Switch Technique]], the user's body is left defenceless while the technique is in use. Unlike the Mind Body Switch, this technique can travel in a curved line.

[[Clan::Yamanaka clan| ]]
